message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.DS, cs.SE. 

The paper introduces an implementation of an extension of Answer Set Programming (ASP) with language constructs from dynamic (and temporal) logic, providing an expressive computational framework for modeling dynamic applications. This work involves logical foundations, translation of dynamic formulas into temporal logic programs, and the reduction of dynamic formulas to temporal logic programs. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science). Additionally, the paper deals with programming languages and computational complexity, which suggests the sub-categories cs.PL (Programming Languages) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). Finally, the implementation aspect of the work suggests the sub-category cs.SE (Software Engineering).
